name: Astronhole
description:
Hey there!

This game was actually made in 3 days.

The goal is simple : avoid the falling objects and survive as much as you can without getting swallowed by the black hole.

To move, hold LEFT CLICK button and move your mouse, to use the speed boost, use the RIGHT CLICK button.

It should work on mobile too, but I didn't have enough time to polish the inputs so it's far from being perfect.
